txt.en: Although it cannot match the lost splendour of Usk-tóga, you have been welcomed as a friend in the halls of the Longbeards. You are able to quickly return to Thorin's Hall in Ered Luin.
Although it cannot match the lost splendour of Usk-tóga, you have been welcomed as a friend in the halls of the Longbeards. You are able to quickly return to Thorin's Hall in Ered Luin.
